We are proud to be partnering with @bitcoin2019conf - be sure to join our team in San Fran, June 25th & 26th. There's an incredible lineup of speakers (see link below) including our co-founder @dhruvbansal and other leaders from the ATX bitcoin community!

1122876039099813889.text: @GideonOPowell & I went to the Capitol today in Austin to have a meeting with the TX Rep that put forward the misinformed “crypto” bill, good dialogue, they have a much better understanding & want to engage the community. This was the car right outside the Capitol, set the tone.pic.twitter.com/Qd3bHXRPcc

1121430941333774336.text: From Hodl Waves, to the Bitcoin Dust analysis, to the Unchained Vault. @dhruvbansal has been one of my favorite builder and researchers in this space. The dude is an absolute rockstar. This episode is a must listen.https://twitter.com/POVCryptoPod/status/1121429598330220551 …

Meet your favorite Bitcoin twitter friends. 
Experience cutting edge lightning tech 
Learn to make a node 
Get cool bitcoin swag

1121460007793356800.text:
1/ Restoring Dai's peg comes down to supply and demand — we're not reinventing economics here.

So how do we bring Dai back to $1.00 USD? We need to create more demand to offset its high supply!

Enter Dharma.https://blog.dharma.io/dharma-is-great-for-dai-80d4edfe696e …

1120929698828042241.text:
French Lender Societe Generale Issues $112 Million Bond on Ethereum

Article:
"The rating agency said it considers the use of blockchain technology 'credit positive' for the lender."

Using "the blockchain" is now "credit positive" for some institutions.https://www.coindesk.com/french-lender-societe-generale-issues-112-million-bond-on-ethereum …

1122899507669110786.text: “There is a symmetry to Bitcoin... it’s like an orchestra internally, it’s quite amazing” David Puell (@kenoshaking) on Bitcoin’s onchain activity in contrast to other coins. Listen for more takes. https://twitter.com/povcryptopod/status/1122883014160109569 …

1121843729034170368.text: New Podcast Recommendation: @POVCryptoPod has an ethereum and bitcoin fan as hosts.  Pretty refreshing cuz you hear both sides and a more balanced perspective. Good episode to checkout is the one they did with @dhruvbansal from @unchainedcap.https://povcryptopod.libsyn.com/45-sovereign-crypto-banking-with-dhruv-bansal …

1122883014160109569.text:
47 — Blockchain Archeology with @kenoshaking https://link.medium.com/ahmT7wdIhW 

David Puell is the Head of Research at Adaptive Capital, a crypto investment fund that specializes in on-chain analysis, in order to guide investment decisions.

See topics

1122883016336916485.text:
TOPICS
- TA in Crypto v Other Markets
- Herd Mentality, “Reflexivity” in Crypto markets
- Investor sophistication
- Markets cycles since WWII, crypto relevancy
- Crossreferencing Price, UTXO, and Time
- Bitcoin valuation with on-chain analysis
- Eliminating noise w/ on-chain data

1121460469561040896.text:
46 — Sovereign Crypto Banking with @dhruvbansal http://link.medium.com/HDfEu59bbW 

TOPICS!
- Crypto on-chain analytics
- Intersection of Big-Data and Crypto
- Bitcoin/Ethereum differences with Big Data analysis
- Unchained Capital’s lending and Multisig services
- Crypto contingency plans

1121429598330220551.text: POV Episode 46 is here! @dhruvbansal of @unchainedcap comes on to the podcast to talk the future of Bitcoin and crypto financial services. You will learn about onchain analytics, crypto backed loans, multi sig for normal people, and much much more. https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/pov-crypto-podcast-your-crypto-echo-chamber-dies-here/id1436674724#episodeGuid=21c82dcbfa0340bab89c38cabc9020b2 …
